settings.content: Theme settings allow designers to provide an easy way for any user to customize the look and feel of their shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code. Please see our [help page on theme settings](http://docs.shopify.com/themes/theme-templates/settings) to learn more about how you can make the theme customizable.

settings.label: Primary
settings.info: Used for text links, and primary buttons

settings.info: [Where do I find my MailChimp form action URL?](http://docs.shopify.com/support/configuration/store-customization/where-do-i-get-my-mailchimp-form-action)

settings.label: Mobile Sticky Checkout Free Shipping Text
PDP Free Shipping Text
settings.default: Free Shipping on $50+ valid on US orders only

settings.label: Collection handle for GWP
settings.info: please make sure there are less than 50 products in the collection

settings.label: Product handle for GWP
settings.info: Product handle only, do not include variant id

settings.label: Title for GWP
settings.info: if GWP promo display level is variant and only one variant is selected, please include variant name in title

settings.label: Show donate item in product id
beauty deal price for Beauty Deal 5
beauty deal price for Beauty Deal 10
Enable styled tables
settings.info: This will add borders and padding to your tables

settings.label: Enable solid menu background color
settings.info: This will enable a solid header over the banner images

settings.label: Enable menu background transparency
settings.info: This will make the sticky menu semi-transparent throughout the shop

settings.label: Stretch background to fill the password page
